Sensory evaluation of PKO was carried out at Wilmar (Shanghai) Biotechnology Research & Development Centre, China. It was approved by the committee of Wilmar (Shanghai) R&D Center according to their research regulations. An experienced panel of 6 members (3 males and 3 females, between the age of 20 and 40) participated in sensory evaluation and informed consent was obtained from all participants. Quantitative descriptive analysis was used to evaluate the sensory property. The detailed method used for sensory evaluation can be found in Zhang et al.
